casebody.data:
HELEN M. NOLES v. ARTHUR PETER, Assignee. Decided March 10th, 1926.

The cause was argued before Bond, C. J., Pattison, Urner, Adkins, Oeeutt, Digges, and Parke, JJ.

Fred B. Rhodes, for the appellant. Arthur Peter, with whom was J. W. Whiting on the brief, for the appellee. Urner, J.,

delivered the opinion of the Court, affirming the order, with costs.
